nodes.label: Narcissism
nodes.definition: Grandiose self-regard and need for attention

nodes.label: Denialism
nodes.definition: Rejection of expert narratives and seeking unconventional explanations

nodes.label: Need For Chaos
nodes.definition: Desire to provoke or exacerbate disorder

nodes.label: Social Media Engagement
nodes.definition: Likes, posts, replies, and reposts on social media

nodes.label: Conspiracy Theory Support
nodes.definition: Behavioral endorsement and amplification of conspiracy theories

nodes.label: Political Extremity
nodes.definition: Self-identification at far left or far right of political spectrum

nodes.label: Political Polarization
nodes.definition: Increased division and opposition between political groups

nodes.label: Covid19 Pandemic
nodes.definition: Global health crisis providing context for conspiracy theories

nodes.label: Infodemic
nodes.definition: Overwhelming flood of information, often misleading

network_graph.description: Network visualization of psychological factors and conspiracy theory support

factor_frequency.description: Frequency of psychological factors in analyzed texts

theory_coverage.description: How well the theory explained the analyzed texts
